scripts.setup-libs: mkdir -p src/app/lib/mithril/ && cp node_modules/mithril/mithril.min.js src/app/lib/mithril/ && cp node_modules/mithril/mithril.min.js.map src/app/lib/mithril/ && mkdir -p src/app/lib/requirejs/ && cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js src/app/lib/requirejs/require.js && mkdir -p src/app/lib/require-css/ && cp node_modules/require-css/*.js src/app/lib/require-css/ && mkdir -p src/app/lib/requirejs-text/ && cp node_modules/requirejs-text/*.js src/app/lib/requirejs-text/
scripts.setup: npm run setup-symlink && npm run setup-libs
scripts.build: npm run build-css && r.js -o src/build.js && rm build/build* && rm build/app/app.scss
